genres.label: Symphonies
genres.description: Monumental works for orchestra spanning the classical and romantic eras.

genres.label: Concertos
genres.description: Virtuosic showcases for soloists and orchestra.

genres.label: Chamber Music
genres.description: Intimate performances for small ensembles and living rooms alike.

works.title: Symphony No. 5 in C minor, Op. 67
works.description: Perhaps the most recognizable opening in classical music, this symphony charts a triumphant journey from darkness to light.

works.title: Symphony No. 1 in C minor, Op. 68
works.description: Brahms labored for two decades on this majestic first symphony, a worthy heir to Beethoven's legacy.

works.title: Symphony No. 5 in E minor, Op. 64
works.description: Lush melodies and sweeping orchestration explore fate and resilience in Tchaikovsky's beloved fifth symphony.

works.title: Piano Concerto No. 2 in C minor, Op. 18
works.description: A Romantic showcase packed with soaring melodies and pianistic fireworks.

works.title: Piano Concerto No. 21 in C major, K. 467
works.description: Nicknamed 'Elvira Madigan,' this concerto pairs grace and wit with Mozart's signature lyricism.

works.title: Symphony No. 3 in C minor, Op. 78 'Organ'
works.description: A thrilling orchestral tapestry crowned by the mighty organ.

works.title: String Quartet in G minor, Op. 10
works.description: Debussy brings impressionistic color to the traditional string quartet form.

works.title: Piano Quintet in A major, D. 667 'Trout'
works.description: A sparkling chamber favorite with variations on Schubert's song 'Die Forelle'.

works.title: Contrasts for Clarinet, Violin, and Piano, Sz. 111
works.description: A rhythmically charged trio commissioned by Benny Goodman, blending folk motives with modern bite.
